amendment.description: Amendment creates a Regulatory Reform Task Force to make recommendations for the reduction of unnecessary higher education regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to create a Regulatory Reform Task Force to make recommendations to reduce unnecessary higher education regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gowdy amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Gowdy.
